channel.title: Help FAQ's
channel.description:
[center][size=14pt][u][b]Moparscape server help FAQ's[/b][/u][/size][/center]
FAQ = Fequentaly asked questions.
[b]FAQ:[/b] How do I port forward?
[b]Answer:[/b] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,383567.0.html]uTorrent Way[/url] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,379865.0.html]Linksys Route[/url] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,342685.0.html]Any other Router[/url]
[b]FAQ:[/b] How do I host a server on Linux?
[b]Answer:[/b] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,367407.0.html]Linux Tutorial[/url]
[b]FAQ:[/b] How do I make a item go to the correct spot, such as a shield?
[b]Answer:[/b] Go to item.java look for [code]shield[/code] and add the id in there like it looks for the others. Ex: 12, 13
[b]FAQ:[/b] How do I add a command to my server?
[b]Answer:[/b] Go in 'Client.java' search for "command" and there should be a line called [code]customcommand()[/code] Or something along those lines.
[b]FAQ:[/b] How do I change my starting area?
[b]Answer:[/b] log in on a test account, do not move. type ::pos or ::mypos, or whatever the command is for your server, then open "Player.java" search for the first number that popped up for the coords, and there you go, just change them.
[b]FAQ:[/b] How do I make npc's open a shop?
[b]Answer:[/b] Considering you have the npc id, go in "Client.java"- normally correct spot. Search "wanneshop" And it should pop up like the npc id, and WanneShop = 1, etc.. Just copy and paste from there. with the shop id you want.
[b]FAQ:[/b] How do I make a client/server work with 64bit?
[b]Answer:[/b] CLASSPATH [code]CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files (86x)\Java\jdk1.6.0_16\bin;%CLASSPATH%;[/code] path [code]C:\Program Files (86x)\Java\jdk1.6.0_16\bin;[/code]
[b]FAQ:[/b] How do I stop syi's?
[b]Answer:[/b] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,286718.0.html]Click Here[/url]
[b]FAQ:[/b] How do I change prices of the items?
[b]Answer:[/b] "item.cfg" Before the bonus's, and right after the last word.. You will see the prices, change them to what u want.
[b]FAQ:[/b] How do I change the teleports?
[b]Answer:[/b] Most servers use it by action buttons, figure out the button id, search for it in client.java and there are the cords.
[b]FAQ:[/b] How do I change npc drops?
[b]Answer:[/b] Depending on the base, most of them use drop.cfg, npcdrop.cfg, etc.. Just go in there and look at what the other ones, and make your own.
[b]FAQ:[/b] How do I add npc's?
[b]Answer:[/b] AutoSpawn.cfg, normally looks like [code]//------NpcID---CoordX--CoordY--Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-HP-Descrption[/code]
[b]FAQ:[/b] How do I change what a npc says above their head?
[b]Answer:[/b] Considering your doing this because they already say something, open "Npchandler.java" search for a word from what they are saying, and replace that line with what you want, Copy and paste it and change the npc id, etc.. To make a new one.
[b]FAQ:[/b] How do I change the crowns, from the default ones? Or make custom ones load?
[b]Answer:[/b] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,265260.0.html]Here[/url] Click there to see the tutorial on how.
[b]FAQ:[/b] How do I change the max level?
[b]Answer:[/b] Search [code]return ##;[/code] replace the ## with the max skill number, search for that in client.java. <- That answer is unknown, correct me if I am wrong.
Got a suggestion? Tell me, and I will look at it. Got a question, and no answer? I will try my best to answer it. So post it.
Thanks all the FAQ's I could find that looked important, if you would like some added, just follow this guideline.
[code]FAQ: Answer:[/code]
For the answer, if you don't want to type, it post the topic and I will find it. Thanks.
Credits: Moparscape Community Moparisthebest Community.

item.title: Help FAQ's
item.dc:creator: @Explisionist Explisionist
item.description:
@Explisionist wrote:

[center][size=14pt]Moparscape server help FAQ’s[/size][/center]

FAQ = Fequentaly asked questions.

FAQ: How do I port forward?

Answer:
uTorrent Way
Linksys Route
Any other Router

FAQ: How do I host a server on Linux?

Answer:
Linux Tutorial

FAQ: How do I make a item go to the correct spot, such as a shield?

Answer: Go to item.java look for shield and add the id in there like it looks for the others. Ex: 12, 13

FAQ: How do I add a command to my server?

Answer: Go in ‘Client.java’ search for “command” and there should be a line called customcommand()
Or something along those lines.

FAQ: How do I change my starting area?

Answer: log in on a test account, do not move. type ::pos or ::mypos, or whatever the command is for your server, then open “Player.java” search for the first number that popped up for the coords, and there you go, just change them.

FAQ: How do I make npc’s open a shop?

Answer: Considering you have the npc id, go in “Client.java”- normally correct spot. Search “wanneshop” And it should pop up like the npc id, and WanneShop = 1, etc… Just copy and paste from there. with the shop id you want.

FAQ: How do I make a client/server work with 64bit?

Answer: CLASSPATH CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files (86x)\Java\jdk1.6.0_16\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
path C:\Program Files (86x)\Java\jdk1.6.0_16\bin;

FAQ: How do I stop syi’s?

Answer: Click Here

FAQ: How do I change prices of the items?

Answer: “item.cfg” Before the bonus’s, and right after the last word… You will see the prices, change them to what u want.

FAQ: How do I change the teleports?

Answer: Most servers use it by action buttons, figure out the button id, search for it in client.java and there are the cords.

FAQ: How do I change npc drops?

Answer: Depending on the base, most of them use drop.cfg, npcdrop.cfg, etc… Just go in there and look at what the other ones, and make your own.

FAQ: How do I add npc’s?

Answer: AutoSpawn.cfg, normally looks like //------NpcID---CoordX--CoordY--Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-HP-Descrption

FAQ: How do I change what a npc says above their head?

Answer: Considering your doing this because they already say something, open “Npchandler.java” search for a word from what they are saying, and replace that line with what you want, Copy and paste it and change the npc id, etc… To make a new one.

FAQ: How do I change the crowns, from the default ones? Or make custom ones load?

Answer: Here Click there to see the tutorial on how.

FAQ: How do I change the max level?

Answer: Search return ##; replace the ## with the max skill number, search for that in client.java. <- That answer is unknown, correct me if I am wrong.

Got a suggestion? Tell me, and I will look at it. Got a question, and no answer? I will try my best to answer it. So post it.

Thanks all the FAQ’s I could find that looked important, if you would like some added, just follow this guideline.

FAQ: Answer:

For the answer, if you don’t want to type, it post the topic and I will find it. Thanks.

Credits:
Moparscape Community
Moparisthebest Community.
